description: Allows resetting or updating a client's password when requested on-site or remotely.
Allows permanently deleting a client's account from the Rapide system.
Allows viewing detailed driver information, including assigned rides and current vehicle.
Allows modifying the phone number linked to a driver’s profile for communication purposes.
Allows activating or suspending a driver’s account, preventing or allowing ride assignments.
Allows resetting or updating a driver's login password.
Allows modifying the performance score or trust level of a driver based on ride behavior or client feedback.
Allows permanently removing a driver’s account from the Rapide system.
Allows viewing information about other admins, including their site assignment and roles.
Allows creating a new admin account and assigning it to a specific site.
Allows modifying the phone number linked to an admin profile.
Allows activating or suspending an admin to enable or restrict their access to the back office.
Allows changing the admin’s role, impacting the base level of access they have.
Allows resetting or updating the password of an admin account.
Allows customizing an admin's individual access rights beyond their role.
Allows permanently removing an admin account from the system.
Allows viewing details about local Rapide sites used for deposits, account support, and driver operations.
Allows registering a new Rapide site location to expand service coverage or driver access.
Allows changing the display name or label of a Rapide site.
Allows updating the quality or ranking score assigned to a site based on its performance or capacity.
Allows changing the category of the site (e.g., full-service, deposit-only, driver-only hub).
Allows modifying the physical address or GPS coordinates of a site.
Allows managing which vehicles are assigned or available at a specific site.
Allows assigning or removing admins responsible for a specific site.
Allows permanently removing a site from the Rapide network.
Allows registering a new vehicle into the Rapide fleet.
Allows modifying details of a registered vehicle (e.g., model, plate number).
Allows linking a specific vehicle to a driver for ride assignments.
Allows assigning a vehicle to a specific site for operational tracking and dispatching.
Allows permanently removing a vehicle from the Rapide fleet.
